SYSTEM: FAIR_Semantics.pdf: Página 6
FAIR semantics
Preliminary Recommendations
6
P-Rec. 1: Use Globally Unique, Persistent and 
Resolvable Identifier for Semantic Artefacts, their
content and their versions
§ Related FAIR principle: F1
§ Related recomendations: W3C Data on the Web (BP-
9), OBO Foundry (Principle 3-4), among others.
§ Stakeholders: Practitioner and Repository
speaker: SYSTEM
